name: chat-app-yt
description: - **🌟 Modern Tech Stack**: MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) + Socket.io + TailwindCSS + Daisy UI.   - **🎃 Secure Authentication & Authorization**: Powered by JSON Web Tokens (JWT).   - **👾 Real-Time Messaging**: Instant chat functionality using Socket.io.   - **🚀 Online User Status**: Live status updates with Socket.io and React Context API.   - **👌 Global State Management**: Simplified state handling with Zustand.   - **🐞 Robust Error Handling**: Seamless error management on both client and server.   - **⭐ Free Deployment**: Learn how to deploy like a pro at no cost!   - **⏳ And More!**: Packed with additional features to enhance user experience.

scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
